case.state: Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is in human form—it's your boy Guzma!
It’s showtime!
You already know who it is- it’s your boy Guzma!
Is that...a clown?
And people call us freaks.
Who's this joker?
The hell is that thing? I ain't ever seen that thing on a pokedex.
That some kind of talkin' fairy type?
Wait, we bringing out Pokemon after all? Are we gonna battle, or is that thing gonna play cards now?
That some weird lookin' Mareep? Are we gonna be havin' a pokemon battle after all?
Yo, why are we in a bedroom? You got something weird in mind, punk?
Whose room is this? This ain't some creepy thing, is it, punk?
Playing in the bedroom, huh? You got something in mind, girly?
Bedroom, huh? Guess that makes sense for a private game.
Damnit. What's that freak whore doin' here? Maybe if I just ignore her, she'll go away.
Am I really going to have to deal with that slut's nonsense the whole game? Maybe I'll just ignore her.
If you want a pummelin' I can give ya one, but the hell are y'all doing in this damn forest?
The heck are ya'll doing here? I was tryin' to catch this dark type and stumbled into you punks.
Heh! Looks like we got a whole crowd gatherin' here to watch y'all get beaten down by Guzma!
Really? Y'all chumps couldn't even get in? Tch, whatever, let's just play!
Hey, this place reminds me of back home! Always nice to punk some chumps in a familiar setting.
Whose pad is this?
Huh. This place kinda reminds me of the A- NEVERMIND!
The hell is this? Some sappy wallpaper?
...Not sure how I feel about this.
Some of y’all look familiar… Eh, I’ll still punk you all the same.
Literature club? What the hell are all these literature nerds doing here?
Y'all a part of some freakin' poetry club? The hell are you doing at a place like this?
Oh? Ya'll seem to want a challenge. Well, if it’s a fight you want, it’s a fight you’re gonna get!
I ain’t scared of people like ya'll! Bring it on!
I've already won this game! You punks can't even touch me!
Dealio! Toss me ~cards~ cards!
~cards~'s all I need to smash ya!
Gimme... ~cards~.
~cards~ cards! Make it quick!
Uh... ~cards~ cards, I guess.
Get ready for a beatdown, people!
Y'all are gonna see what happens when you mess with big, bad Guzma!
Ain't nobody getting the better of me this round!
Say goodbye to your clothes, y'all, ya boy has this round on lock!
Heh, no chance in hell I'm losin' this round!
Scared yet, people? You oughta be with ya boy Guzma around!
Ain't nobody getting the better of me this round!
Ya boy's got this in the bag!
Who I'm up against and what my odds are doesn't matter - I'm gonna beat you down!
Get ready to be smashed by the naked, but still hated boss of Team Skull!
Hell yeah!
Ya boy's got the good stuff, both with his bod and with his hand!
Y'all chumps are in for it now!
Y'all are in for it now!
Prepare to be smashed into bits!
They don't call me 'the Undefeated' for nothin'! Y'all don't stand a chance!
Oh, yeah, Guzma's got this round on lockdown!
You chumps had no idea who you were messin' with, challengin' me!
Right, now I'm gettin' a good hand! What a load of crap!
Y'all are gonna pay for makin' me ditch the bling!
It's showtime, punks. Prepare to get wrecked.
Maybe the pants were weighin' me down or something! You ain't got me beat now!
Watch as big bad Guzma beats you into the ground!
I'd have liked hands like these earlier, you punks!
I'd have liked to face off in a Pokemon Battle or somethin' - this whole poker thing is whack.
You guys must be pretty dumb to think you have a chance against ya boy!
People like to call me the ‘human version of rat poison.’ I just thank ‘em for the compliment.
These ought to be enough to beat all of ya punks.
Do y'all do this stuff for fun or something? That's weird as heck.
These ought to be enough to beat all of ya punks.
Quit stallin' and show me your hands, people!
Huh?! This ain't the hand I needed, dealer!
I've never been scared of nothin' or nobody! So show me your damn hand already!
I ain't gonna have trouble beating y'all with these!
Ain't no way I'm losing this!
The bling's gonna be staying on this round, chumps!
What's your angle, anyway? You guys just do this to see people naked? That's whack.
Hah! This hand couldn't be better!
I'm surprised the rest of ya haven't given up yet, considering you're up against big, bad Guzma!
I hate waiting on y'all to do your turns, so hurry up!
Just do your damn turns! I hate standin' 'round here without the bling.
I ain't got no time to mess around with hands like these!
That's it, y'all are goin' down!
Tch! I can pull through with this hand! I'm big, bad Guzma!
This hand is all I need to smash you all!
Tch! This ain't gonna be enough to stop Guzma!
You want me to smash you, dealer?!
Tch! This hand is a bad joke.
Card games are for chumps, anyway!
You want me to smash you, dealer?!
Tch! This ain't gonna be enough to stop Guzma!
You want me to smash you, dealer?!
Guzma! What is wrong with you?!
If ya make me lose the bling, dealer, I'll be making you lose a lot more!
Yo, these cards are good enough, right? You better not be messin' with me, dealer.
Y'all are stupid!
Tch! This game's dumb, anyway - how about we have a proper Pokemon battle or somethin'?
One of y'all has been rigging this damn thing from the start. Ain't gonna be pretty when I find out who.
(C’mon, Guzma! You can do better than this!) …Tch.
Guzma!! You can't go and lose now!
Damn it! Y'all have been settin' me up or somethin'!
Tch! A hand like this is like asking for a beating!
Whatever, ya dumb punks. I don't need a great hand to beat y'all down!
Guzma!! What is wrong with you? If ya keep getting hands like this, you're toast!
Who do I gotta crush for gettin' a hand as crap as this, huh?
Guzma!! If I'm gettin' hands like these, I'm gonna need to go nude!
Y'all are stupid!
I'm proud of Team Skull because we're a gang of survivors. We're the people who refused to stop just because people told us we couldn't do it.
Heh. I don't know what the most humiliatin' moment of your lives is, but when this game is over, y'all are gonna have a new one.
I hope y'all are ready to experience the most humiliatin' moment of your lives.
What's with all the damn kids around here? I see enough of you brats acting tough on Alola.
The hell kinda game is this? Do you kids even know what y'all are gettin' into?
Why are we even givin' the freakin' computer cards? The hell's it supposed to strip?
Y'know what, kid? Maybe I was wrong - tiny or not, you got fight in ya.
What, am I too loud for your delicate little ears, punk? Buzz off!
Ain't no rules about bein' loud, punk, so either square up or shut up.
Hold up, that sheep thing talks?
Kanto? You mean that region where that weirdo professor came from?
Kanto? Izzat where you're from? The finally get a Dark-type Gym Leader?
Who the hell izzat? You got grunts too, girly?
Whozzat? I'll beat 'em to a pulp too!
Killed someone? The hell are you on about?
What's playing a damn card game gotta do with killin' fools? I'm just here to win, girly.
Guess I'm into hip-hop, and techno stuff. Ain't like I got much time for music when I got chumps like you to beat.
Yo, kid! Why even play this game if you're gonna be this awkward? And what's all the nerd stuff you keep going on about?
(That long haired girl over there's givin' me the creeps somehow. Somethin' ain't right about her.)
Tch! Nothing but dudes around. Whatever, I'll still beat y'all into the dirt!
Y'know, some of y'all are pretty good lookin' for being total nerds.
Tch, whatever. Weird, spooky forest or not, I'll kick your asses.
Y'know what? Whatever. If ya want a beatdown, you'll get it, even in some weird forest.
What were you mutterin' over there, kid? If ya got somethin' to say, say it to my face!
You better save your breath, witch girl - this is the last round I'm plannin' on losing against you!
At least I went all the way through with it, ya little bitch! Looks like you got cold feet after that little red strand!
Grr, whatever. As the man that I am, I can deal with a small loss.
Fine then... Looks like I'm goin' again.
Huh? I thought this kinda hand was alright!
This is Bouffalant crud!
Wha? Ain't this supposed to be a good hand?
Ya still think you got a chance 'cause you beat me this round? Get real.
I ain't gonna show you punks any mercy.
Tch! Those cards were rigged anyways!
This deck is seriously busted!
Grrr.... Shoot.
No big deal. Nope. None at all.
Yea, my hand was crap and I lost. That's the last you'll be seein' of that!
I ain't gonna stop pummelin' you all just 'cause you made me lose the bling.
Tch! Those cards were rigged anyways!
This deck is seriously busted!
Grrr.....Damnit.
Tch! One of you ain't playin' fair, and i don't appreciate it.
Ever had your own foot shoved up your mouth, dealer?
Tch! Those cards were rigged anyways!
This deck is seriously busted!
This can't be happenin', dealer.
I'm gettin' real tired of punks like you, dealer.
Hermit? I don't wanna be a stupid hermit. I'm gonna be a boss!
Good, cuz I got no plans to become a stupid hermit.
I don't give a damn about your royalty! Even royalty can fall on hard times, ya know!
Tch. Royalty. And why exactly should I care?
Calm down there big guy. Things will heat up eventually.
Calm down, man. Things are only just gettin' started.
These shades are special. They were made just for me.
These shades were made for me and me alone.
Or maybe ya just think stupid hair makes ya look cool. Just like that Gladion dork.
Big deal, you made me lose the swag. I ain't planning on losing any more!
Yeah, whatever, jacket's going next. I just wear it for style anyway, ain't like it gets cold in Alola.
Not a huge loss. There ain't any cold weather in Alola anyways.
Watch the goggles, punks, they're custom-made. Got it!?
Jealous of the kicks, I bet. I got a dozen pairs like these, so you can keep them for all I care!
This here bling? It's a symbol o' Team Skull, and y'all better not forget it. I hate takin' it off, but ain't like I got a choice.
Alright, alright, I'm takin' 'em off. But I ain't playing around anymore, got that?
Crap - shirt's comin' off, but ya boy ain't out of the game yet!
Listen here, punks! Doesn't matter if I have my bling, my clothes or my underwear! I'm the big bad leader of Team Skull, Guzma!
I don't give a damn what everyone thinks about Team Skull. Because I know that every one of its members is someone who worked hard, did their best, and got jack-shit for it.
What's up with you, pink girl? You're freakin' the hell out over there.
A man like me wouldn't be playin' this if I wasn't ready to get into it!
I'll show you what passion looks like when you show me that I need to be passionate!
I'm guessin' that it's the same for your shades, big guy.
Your shades probably got a similar story, big guy.
You beat criminals? That's a laugh. From what I heard, it was some kid that did the heavy lifting while you stalked them.
Ha! Nice try miss champ. But I know you didn't beat Galactic. After all, it's that Lucas kid who's walkin' around with Giritina in his pocket.
The bling's staying on. I gotta rep Team Skull while I destroy you!
I don't need no glasses to see how I'm gonna wreck you, anyway!
Victory's in my sights, with or without glasses!
Don't go expecting me to lose now, people! I can and will crush you, nude or not!
I may be nude, but that doesn’t mean I can’t smash you all the same!
I ain’t goin’ down without a fight!
You don't have Guzma the Undefeated on the ropes yet!
Yo, that was a joke, by the way. Don't actually touch 'em, punk.
Just 'cause I lost the bling doesn't mean nothing! I'll still kick your cans all over the place!
If I see one scuff on that chain, there’ll be HELL to pay!
Don't matter what game it is, nobody's got Guzma beat! I'm fired up now, punks, so be ready to get smashed!
I’m not gonna play around anymore. From now on, it's all or nothin'!
What's the matter? My rockin' body got y'all distracted or something? Keep playin', chumps!
What is it with you and numbers?! You're like that guy with green glasses down at the Aeth-
Can you not talk about math and stuff for a few minutes?! You're just as annoying as that green glasses guy at the Aeth-
My brain's doin' some serious backflips right now. It's just like talkin' to that one guy with the green glasses at Aeth-
You look awfully familiar. But I can't figure out why.
I swear I've seen you somewhere before. Now if only I could figure out where...
This guy is a lot like that Kiawe guy. Except he somehow seems even more intense.
I feel like I probably shouldn't mess with this guy. I feel like he'd beat me and my Pokemon by himself.
What kinda lame-ass costume izzat?!
What's with that ridiculous get-up?!
Hmm...
I wonder...
Actually...
Geez. The more I look at that dumb outfit of yours, the stupider it gets.
No matter how much I try to think about it, your outfit is just stupid, chump.
Well, go on then! Show us how a man does it!
Show us this "manly passion" you've been goin' on about!
Let's see what ya got in store this time, big man.
Your turn again, big guy.
Come on big guy. Can't you do better than that?
What's the problem, big guy? I would've expected ya to be better.
Time for you to go again, big guy.
You're not doin' too well, big guy.
Is that... fur? You even human, punk?
Hey! Punk! Why do you seem so indifferent about all this? You think you're better than me?
Say something, damnit! You think you're better then me just cuz you can keep yer trap shut?!
You a thug as well, huh? Whatever. Just don't mess with Team Skull and we ain't gonna have a problem.
Heh! This game's a piece of cake!
Take the loss and move on, punk!
Shoulda seen it comin', chump.
And that's another victory for Guzma.
That's right! Ain't no keepin' up with Guzma!
Should've expected that loss when you're up against Guzma!
You better not have thought you had a chance, punk.
Nervous? You better be, Punk! Now take somethin' off!
Winnin' feels pretty damn good!
That's what you get for messin' with Guzma!
Take off somethin' big so we can move along, chump!
It doesn't matter I'm naked! You're still going down like the chump you are!
You givin' up yet?
Tch! Take somethin' off and move on!
Make it quick, punk, we ain't got time for ya!
Yeah, yeah, just take somethin' off. Tch.
Hey, uh... What happened to ya?
Did your hair just get longer? No, wait, it just straightened out.
The hell's this thing supposed to strip? It's a frickin' orb of light!
Who the hell let a pokemon or somethin' play a game like this?
You two know each other? I would've never guessed.
You two friends? That's weird.
Kill me? I'd like to see you try. You don't scare me!
Ha! There ya go with the empty threats again. I ain't scared of you!
What's with all the steam? You burnin'?
Izzat smoke? What's happenin' with ya?
Now that I take another look, this girl is shakin' all over. She can't be very dangerous
Hmmm... I don't think this Hex Maniac reject could be all that dangerous. She's been shakin' this whole time.
You don't need them bandages to hold yerself together, do ya?
You sure ya don't need to stay in one piece, Nikaido?
I don't think I wanna crush this girl. Maybe I can just make her leave.
This girl already seems like she's scared of everything. Maybe I can get her to just go home.
Why are ya still here? Didn't I tell you to scram?
Didn't ya get the memo? I told ya you could leave.
So you're really not gonna go home? Fine then.
I gave you a chance to go home, but you didn't take it.
What'd I tell you about complainin', sadsack?!
Stop talkin' and just take the damn thing off already.
You don't really seem to care about gettin' naked, blondie.
Why are you actin' as if this is no big deal for you, blondie?
How can ya say that with such a straight face?
Grr. Of course idols are privileged in other regions too.
Hmph. First the kahuna and now this chick. Idols always get big-name titles.
Y'all get all the glory, while us little guys just stay behind...
No waitin'! Get strippin, NOW!
Don't you tell me what to do! You're the one that lost!
I've decided. I'm gonna smash you, and I'm gonna make it hurt.
Prepare for trouble. Serious trouble.
You're not walkin' away from this unscathed. I'll make sure of it.
Hah! A gym leader exposin' themselves in public place like this!
Ha! A gym leader lettin' it all out in a place like this!
Ha! The gym leader's boutta embarrass herself just like that!
The hell? That kid's actually playing, too? that's messed up.
What the hell's a kid doin' here? Ain't it past your bedtime?
Yo, girly, this ain't no place for kids. Ya better scram while ya can.
The hell are you still doing here, kid? Ain't it past your bedtime or somethin'?
The hell are you doin' here, kid? I almost forgot you were even frickin' playin'.
Why the hell is there a champion here?
Is that a champion? What the hell's she doin' here?
What's wrong, miss champ?
You seem upset about somethin', miss champion.
You still thinkin' you're hot shit?
You still seem to think that this is gonna be an easy win for ya.
Oh? You got quiet all of a sudden.
What happened to all that confidence you had earlier?
Yo, girly - Monika, was it? What's your deal? You've been sayin' some weird ass stuff.
Sounds like you got bullied into comin' here, girly. That's no good.
Did you seriously come here just cuz someone told ya to?
Maybe next time those people tell ya to do you somethin', you tell them "no".
How about next time those people try to make ya do somethin' you say "no".
So what's your deal? What with the costume?
What kinda costume is that? I don't think I've ever seen your trainer class before.
Your loss again, champion. Tell me, are you feeling humiliated?
And now the pants come off. Feelin' embarrassed, miss champion?
It's just like I told ya. Battlin' skills mean nothin' in this game, missy.
I told you ya wouldn't be as good at this game as you thought.
Finally startin' to lose your cool, eh?
There's that face of distress. It was hard work, but there it is.
If you're Sinnoh's champ, then everyone over there must know who you are.
The champion of Sinnoh goin' completely naked here.
That's weird. I guess nobody lost this round.
Oh. Are we taking a break this round?
Did nobody lose this round?
What happened? Is nobody gonna strip this round?
Are we giving the loser a break this time?
(This girl kinda creeps me out.)
(Why does this girl seem so creepy?)
So what's your deal? Ya look like ya could be Kiawe's girl or somethin'.
Are you a fire dancer or somethin'? Ya look an awful lot like that Kiawe guy.
What's your deal? You talk like you're a Pokedex.
Ya talk weird, girly. You sound like that Elio kid's Pokedex.
What's your problem, kid? Ya look about as grim as that Nanu guy.
Geez, your face is empty. It's just like that guy who's always creeping outside of Po town.
Hold on. Ain't you one of the Kanto Gym leaders?
Wait a minute. Ain't you from that Kanto region?
Why are you so pink? Like, all over?
You look really strange. How does your skin even get to be that color?
Ya don't talk much, do ya, girly?
You're up, girly!
An easy win for ya boy!
Make it a good one!
Ya better take off somethin' fun now!
What's the matter? You gettin' scared now?
Take somethin' off so I can beat you some more, Girl!
Let's get the game movin' and the clothes dropping, girly!
Another loss for you and a win for ya boy!
I win, you lose! Take 'em off!
Haha! Another victory for Guzma!
This better be good, ~name~!
You better make this entertaining, girly!
Put on a good show for ya boy, girly!
Take off something nice for Guzma!
You better make this worth it!
Yeah, yeah, take off somethin' good, all that. Tch.
Tch. I might not have won, but I can still watch you lose!
...What the fuck?
Wait. I ain't supposed to talk about that. Forget you heard anything.
Actually, I'm not supposed to say anything about that. Forget it.
Nope. Can't figure it out.
Hmm... I just can't quite put my finger on it...
Maybe you were... Nah...
Someone as intense as this... He could definitely help me crush that Elio brat.
If I could get someone as strong as this guy to help team Skull out, we'd be unstoppable!
Ya look like ya couldn't figure out whether ya wanted to train Fairy types or Flying types and tried to dress for both.
Ya look like how I'd imagine the lamest Flying type trainer ever would look.
You a Flying-type trainer? What's with the stupid getup?
Those wings... Hold on. You aren't friends with that golf girl, are ya, chump?
You're not related to that golf girl in some way, are you, chump?
The belt, huh?
The belt this time, eh?
~clothing.ifPlural(Some|A)~ ~clothing~? Izzat some sort of status symbol or somethin?
Your ~clothing~? Is there even any point to ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~?
That's it? Just your ~clothing~? Kind of lame.
Ya got some nerve, takin' off your bling after I've lost most of mine.
Don't think that you're winnin just cuz ya still got small stuff like that.
What, ya think you're a funny guy? Well I ain't laughing, punk.
You know why they call it chump change? ‘Cause of chumps like you.
Now I'm startin' to get mad.
F-Friggin’ coward…
I-I wasn't expecting anythin' more from a loser like you.
Are you tryin' to rub it in ma face that I lost?!
Now you're really pissin me off, punk!
Anyway, it's annoyin'. Knock it off.
Either way, it's irritatin'. Stop it.
This is gonna be botherin' me for the rest of the game.
How am I supposed to focus on the game while tryin' to figure this out?
So he likes manliness, eh? Good. I've got manliness to spare.
So I just gotta show him how manly I am? Easy.
What's a pathetic kid like you even doin' in a place like this anyway, chump?
Should a kid like you even be here? Scram before ya get yourself hurt, chump.
If ya are, then that's just another reason why I'll hafta smash ya!
I'll smash you either way, but it'll hurt a lot more if you are!
That's a shame. That belt was a real nice piece of bling.
That's too bad. That belt was somethin' fittin' of a boss.
...You really don't look like you should be here, kid.
Are you sure you're allowed in here? Ya look like a teen brat.
Well, whatever it is, it's gone now!
I guess it don't matter since you don't got it no more!
Whatever, punk! Ain't like I care!
You're not gonna win this, punk. Just get that through your head right now!
This game is mine to win, and don't you forget it!
I'll just have to keep pummelin' you until you give up!
Pull something like that again, and I'll rip you a new one.
You'd better watch your back, punk.
How dare you!?
I'll get you back for this...
What happened to all your threats? You seem so pathetic now!
I thought you said you were gonna kill me. You seem to the one who's dyin' inside right now!
Ah-mare-i-what now? Is that a Unovan thing? Ya got that kinda accent.
Hah. You say you ain't a kid, but you sure as hell act like one.
I don't care if you're a kid or not, but if ya ain't gonna be taking things seriously, I'll need to beat you down.
What, ya call that accessorizing? Tch! What a joke.
That ribbon a part of your uniform? How lame is this school you go to?
You sure that girl ain't one of your goons? She's actin' like one.
That don't look like somethin' anyone other than a lackey would do.
That look like it hurt. That goon of yours must've really been gettin' on your nerves.
Sometimes ya gotta smack your lackeys around a bit to make sure they know their place.
Ya got some sorta fire staff ya gonna twirl around?
I get this weird feelin' you like fire too.
Yeah. I guess that's fair enough.
I can get that. I'm not too eager to get naked either.
You've been acting like a real bitch all game, girl. The hell is your problem?
You're one messed up chick, girl. Actin' like a bitch all game and now you pull this crap?
Yo, the hell is your problem, girl? You normally this much of a jerk?
What the hell is your deal? Ya get off on actin' like a bitch or somethin'?
Grey?! Are ya really that gloomy, girl?
Grey panties? You really are just a big bundle of depressing, aren't you?
Really? Ya spent the whole game gettin' my hopes up just to take off your damn sandals now?
And here I thought ya just weren't gonna count the small stuff.
Hurry up and get rid of the stockings already.
Just take off your socks already.
I may not have ever been able to beat people like you in Pokemon battles, but in this game, I can really hit you where it hurts.
Ya didn't think this would be as easy as Pokemon battles, did ya?
Did ya think ya'd be as good at this as you were at battlin'?
Hold on. You burnin'? Ya forget your Burn Heals?
Wait. Have you been burnin' this whole time? Did I somehow miss that?
You gotta learn to bully back, sometime.
You need to learn how to say no. Or better yet, start tellin' them what to do.
Wait. You from Kanto? I think they got ninjas somewhere over there.
Hmmm. Are you from Kanto. They got ninjas there. Right?
You lettin' your underling make your choices for you?
You're gettin' pushed around by your own grunt?
Hold on, is that girl floatin'?
Wait, izzat grunt of yours floatin'?
Those headphones look pretty good. Where can I get a pair?
I think some headphones would suit me. Where'd you get those?
Wait, you're not one of his friends or somethin' are ya?
That guy didn't send ya here, did he?
Heh, I can appreciate a few bits of bling.
Wave bye-bye to your bling, girly.
Just get rid of it - ain't like that's the last you'll lose.
Don't drag it out now. Plenty more losses to come, anyway.
What? You upset about havin' to take off your ~clothing~? That's how I felt about my sunglasses!
So ya still got few bits of bling, do ya?
Oh, big deal, girly. You gotta lose your freakin' ~clothing~.
Why you little...!
You're tryin' to make me mad, ain'tcha?
Oh, come on! Don’t rub it in like that!
Ya still got that thing?!
How do ya even still got somethin' as small as that?
You look like a cornered Wimpod! You feelin' scared yet?
Always remember, freak. I'm the alpha here.
What do you look so worried for? Focus on the game!
If she can't even get back up from that, then you need to think about findin' yourself a better top goon.
Either way, I'm gonna have you beaten by the end of this, Nikaido.
Even if you say that, I'm the one who's gonna be winnin' this, Nikaido.
I don't care how tough ya think you are. I can beat you down all the same.
I don't mind beatin' a girl if I gotta, so don't mess with me, girly!
Tch! Whatever, girly. Ya ain't gonna scare big, bad Guzma with your crap.
Not like I care, girly! Act tough as much as you want, ya still gonna get beat down!
Do I even need to crush this girl? She seems like she's already afraid of me.

Right, now you're showing off! Tch!
Oh, that's a real nice sight, girly!
That'll certainly do! Keep your hands away from it, ya boy needs a good look!
We don't care if people laugh at us, because we've been goin' through that our entire lives. So not only am I proud of Team Skull, I'm DAMN proud of Team Skull!
About damn time! The hell are you even doing here, kid? Shouldn't you be studyin' or somethin'?
Really, brat? You gone puss out now?
What's the problem, brat? Finally giving up? Figured you were a wimp.
What, you chickening out now, punk?
What's the problem, brat? Finally giving up?
The hell are you even still doing here, kid? Scram!
Oh, so ya came back after all, girly. Thought you'd wuss out for good. Or did ya just forget your laptop or somethin'?
...The hell are you gonna be taking off, sheep? And what are you, anyway?
So, what now? Ya gonna do the forfeit already?
Ya didn't think this through didya, Sheep? You gotta do the forfeit now.
Who the hell keeps letting kids into the inventory?
The heck are you doin' at the inventory, kid? Ya look about twelve!
The hell is this kid doing here? Ain't this place a freakin' bar?
Did ya really come into this not knowin' the rules, kid? You really should just back out.
Y'know, team skull could use spunk like yours, kid. If you can train pokemon as well as you can talk back, we might have room for ya.
Y'know, team skull could use spunk like yours, kid. If you can train pokemon as well as you can talk back, we might have room for ya.
The hell is a kid doin' playin' a game like this?
That a school uniform? Ya wouldn't happen to know that Normal-type weirdo, would ya?
A school uniform? You don't actually think school's gonna do anything for ya, do ya?
A musician, eh? You'd better not blast my ears out with god-awful music like that Dragon-type rockstar wannabe.
You better have some good tunes!
Just try not to put as all to sleep with your nerd talk, punk. I hear enough of it from the lady with the pink glasses.
Heh, a high n' mighty princess playin' this game? Are ya fallin' on hard times like that ghost girl's family did?
What's wrong with you?! Ya remind me of that Nanu creep.
What's with you? You're just like that creep that's always hangin' around outside of Po town.
What even is that outfit? Do you not want to win?
Geez. And I thought the Akala Kahuna wore skimpy clothes.
Hah! Keep on losin' like this and you'll be on your way to joinin' me!
You racin' to join me in this or somethin'?
Hah! There ya go again! And you're gonna keep losin' against me!
Heh. Ain't nothing to do with luck, kid. It's pure skill, an you got none.
That a school uniform? Ya wouldn't happen to know that Normal-type weirdo, would ya?
A school uniform? You don't actually think school's gonna do anything for ya, do ya?
But if you think you can just- The shit?!
I figured already you were nothin' but a - holy crap!
Not like I- What the hell?!
I already knew you were - the heck?!
I'm here in the nude and you're over there taking off a goddamn toy, punk?
You think this is just some dumb game, punk?
What the hell? How did you get so far with that stupid toy still on your arm?
Y'know what happens to punks like you who talk about how rich they are all the damn time?
Y'know what happens to spoiled brats like you out on the streets?
That stutter ain't cute, girly, it's just gratin'. Pull yourself together.
What are you mumblin' this time? I'm getting pretty damn sick o' that.
Would ya quit stammerin' and just take 'em off? We ain't got all day!
Right, that collar. Tch, whatever.
What's with that garter, anyway? Ain't like it's holdin' anything up.
Hol' up, ya really gonna go that far?
Ya really gonna shave for this game? That even count as clothing?
Looks like you're just about done, sheep. I gotta say, that wool thing is pretty clever.
Looks like this is your last stop, sheepie. Gonna chicken out, or what?
Takin' off the cape, punk? Really?
You look like you're gonna die just takin' off the freakin' ribbon, kid.
I guess it's good to take a break sometimes.
I guess I could do with a break.
A break sounds good right about now.
If no one's stripping, then I'll just take a break.
We can just take a quick breather.
The hell is that thing anyway, and why the hell did you bring it here?
That's fine. Plumeria's the same way, and she's one of the few people I actually enjoy having around.
Whatever, chump. Ain't like I care about your dumb toys anyway.
Eh. Stupid toys shouldn't concern me anyways.
What just happened? And the heck is a 'shadow game', brat?
Oh? You gettin' into this now?
You're enjoying yourself now?
I don't care what that thing is, but I'm gonna be shoving it up your behind after this game.
I'm going to - ngh - shove that duel thing up your ass!
I hope you liked that 'cause - ah! - I'm really thinkin' about trashing that thing when I'm done here.
That duel-whatever-the-hell is gonna end up where the sun don't shine for ya!
I told ya to stop doing that, didn't I?
You gonna keep doing that? How the hell are you gonna take off our damn panties?
Hah! The hell is with those underpants, loser?
What, your mommy buy those for you, twerp?
They ain't as rich in the mornin' as they were last night.
They end up losing a lot more than some dumb frickin' jacket.
If you're gonna be this awkward the entire time, just give up and save us all the trouble, kid!
Tch. Whatever. I already freakin' lost, so what do I care.
Hold on, this mean you ain't got nothing to lose anymore? That seems off.
Is there anything for you to even take off now, sheep?
I gotta say, sheep, that's impressive! Too bad it ain't gonna help ya!
Gotta say, for bein' a sheep you do look pretty good.
Alright, yeah. It's weird as hell, but I guess it's kind of hot.
Y'know what, sheepie? I don't mind this view at all.
I'd have gone for that dumb, ugly-ass hat. Can you even see anything?
I just gotta think of you as another opponent that needs to be smashed.
Draggin' out the game like this ain't gonna save ya from humiliation, though!
Just one more loss and you're all out, now.
Alright! Break's over!
Break's over! Back to the game!
Start the game back up!
Enough break time! Back to poker!
That's enough! Back to strippin'!
Just looking at you make me think of that annoying Elio brat.
You're just like that brat, Elio. Which means I'm gonna have to beat you down HARD!
So, what's your deal, kid? You got one of them crossdressing fetishes or somethin'?
Hey, hol' up! Where the hell are you running off to, kid!
Yo! Kid! You dropped somethin'! This mean you're finally givin' up?
...The hell? A talkin' computer?
Uh, yo? The hell are you and where the hell did that kid run off to?
...Well, shit, kid. Ya had me fooled.
...Huh. Can't say I saw that coming, kid.
One by one, they fall to me!
Don't sweat the loss, chump! Ain't like ya ever had a chance, anyway!
You losin' and me winnin' was the only way it could've gone!
You just got punked!
Get wrecked!
Join the club, loser! At least try and be a man about it!
You just got punked!
Get wrecked!
Who’s next?!
Just make it quick. I got sh-stuff to do after this.
Now hurry up, ya punk!
Tch! Whatever, so long as you lost, punk!
Hah! Look at you squirm, punk! Serves you right for thinkin' you can go up against Guzma!
I bet this is the most embarrassing moment of your life, scrub. How's it feel to lose to ya boy?
Ya feel like the loser you are yet? Everyone watchin' you humiliate yourself? Good.
What's the matter, chump? Strugglin' to keep it up or something?
What, you gettin' into it or something? You're a real sicko, punk.
Tch! Hurry up and we done with it. We ain't got all day, chump.
You tryin' to compete with me, punk?? You're on!
Psh, you're doing it all wrong, idiot!
Tch! You got no clue how to do it, do ya, chump?
Hah! Don't matter if i won, seeing you struggle like that I know I won with my show.
You squirmin' like that is some sight, punk.
Hahaha! How are you this pathetic, brat?
Y'know, you hear a lotta things about you rich folk - this sort of stuff included!
Tch. I’ll top that easily. (...If I can.)
That's it? C'mon. I'll show you how a real man does it.
Another opponent, fallen to the mighty Guzma!
You actually did it, too! Loser or not, maybe you're aite!
Took you long enough!
And just when things were getting good!
Shame, doesn't look like anyone lost this round. And I was really hopin' for a show too.
No one lost again, huh? Oh well.
Ha! Let it be known that Sinnoh's champion lost to the big, bad Guzma!
You're done miss champ! You lost to me! Guzma!
You're not gonna instantly cream yourself too, are you?
Are you gonna squirt in an instant too?
Excuse me? You're not goin' anywhere!
What?! Get back here!
One by one, they fall to me!
A victory and a show, huh? I can get behind that!
Hope ya got wet enough already, girly, because it's showtime!
You just got punked!
Get wrecked!
Hah! Join the frickin' club, girly!
You just got punked!
Get wrecked!
Hah! Join the frickin' club, girly!
Why don't we just get back to the game?
Let's get the game back goin'.
Let's get to the next hand already!
You get off with your goons? That's just strange.
You're gonna get off... with a balloon?
You're gonna put that thing in you?
This why so many chicks are grass-type trainers?
Damn, those things grew out fast! They grow that stuff just to do this?
Yes! Guess it's a good thing you're gettin' bossed around by your grunt!
Ha! Good thing your underling is keepin' ya to your word!
Who’s next?!
Make it quick. I got sh-stuff to do after this.
Hurry up, girly!
Yo, give me good show now, girl!
You got some skills to show off for me?
Did someone hear somethin'? I didn't.
I must be hearing things.
I don't hear anything.
Noises? I don't hear any noises.
Ya must be dying of shame, girly! Too bad! Ya did this to yourself by challengin' me!
Ain't you just a secret freak, girly?
Look at'cha, defilin' yourself...
Hah! Now you're getting into it, girly! Gettin' all hot and bothered?
I bet you're dyin' inside right now! Serves ya right!
You done yet, girly? Ain't like we got all day here.
I do love watching you squirm, girly!
Need some help there, girly? Ya boy wouldn't mind!
Hng! Nice work there, ~name~! You're gettin' into it now!
You need a hand there? Mine are all freed up now, girly!
Hah! Just at how wet you are, girly!
I'd offer a show, but I already gave ya one, girly.
You sit there and feel humiliated. That's what you do!
Forget about what we do. You just sit there and look good for the rest us.
You don't need to know that You just need to shut up sit there, large lady.
I didn't see anything.
Hey, purple girl. You got a Mimikyu with ya or somethin? I swear I keep seein' tendrils near ya.
What were those weird black ribbons? You got a Mimikyu with you?
Another opponent, fallen to the mighty Guzma!
Good show, good show.
Aite, I'll say it, girly. Ya did a good job there, even if you are a loser.
Took you long enough!
And just when things were getting good!
I have to what? C’mon, man!
Darn. Looks like I’m in dead last. (As expected.)
(Guzma! What is wrong with you?!) ...Here goes nothin’.
I’ll show you how a real winner does this!
~Dude~, could you not freakin' stare? You're makin' it weird!
What, ~girl~, ya like what ya see, girly?
I can see ya staring, ~girl~. Hoping for a feel, girl?
Tch, this whole game was... rigged from the start!
Y'all are a bunch of chumps, makin' a big frickin' deal outta this.
What, ya nerds like what ya see or somethin'? Quit starin'!
Ahh, crap, that feels good!
Damn, I'm gettin' too close now!
You punks ready to see wht ya boy's been storin' up?
Oh yeah, that's the spot...
Hng!
Gah!
Mmph!
Shit, now I gotta clean up this mess.
(Huh? I actually fuckin’ won?) ...AND ANOTHER FLAWLESS VICTORY FOR YA BOY GUZMA!
HAHA! A victory (at last) for your boy Guzma!
Now what I gonna do about my friggin’ bling…
Let this be a lesson to y'all. I always come out on top!
Tch! Y'know what I do to a machine when it messes up? I smash it.
Wha the!? That little girly-boy freakin' won!?
Damn it, how'd this little girl beat me?!
Damn it, how'd this little girl beat me?!
Yeah, alright, kid. Ya did good - but we're gonna have a rematch sometime, got it?
Enjoy your victory, punk. Good luck makin' it home tonight.
Tch! Alright, ya beat me, ~player~. I'll smash you next time!
'Luck' my ass, punk - I know you cheated! Whatever, I'll beat you down next game!
Tch! Whatever, bitch, you beat me this time. Don't think it'd happen again!
Damn… how am I gonna find my bling under all this crap?
Yeah, yeah, I lost. But I gotta admit, that was… kinda fun!
What the hell! WHAT IS THAT THING?!
(Damn, she's thicker than a kindergarten pencil...)

condition.saying: Wait you have to do what if you lose?! I know Kazuma said this was a ‘mature’ game but this seems a bit extreme! If the games from where he’s from are like this no wonder he’s a hopeless pervert… Are you not embarrassed?

case.state: Did ya really come into this not knowin' the rules, kid? You really should just back out.
Can I put my shit back on yet?
Damn it, I need a shower. Tch!
